maximum-input-line-length.help: Maximum input line length for any single command line entry

maximum-arg-count.help: Maximum number of arguments in a single command

history-size.help: Maximum number of previous commands that can be stored in history. Note that each line will occupy by up to maximum-input-line-length bytes on the heap. So by default the history can occupy up to 64 bytes * 16 commands = 1024 bytes.
